title: Another Man's Wife plus 3 Other Tales of Horror
description: Another Man’s Wife is a story about infidelity and what it can lead to for a small town delivery man. Comes With Baggage is a supernatural revenge tale about a man who has undergone a radical surgery. The Serial Killer’s Ghoul: What happens when a killer gets his hands on a book about raising the dead to serve his needs? The Lake Pact is a monster tale that deals with a community’s secret and the cost of keeping it.
author: David   Bernstein
